column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque was exactly what I thought it would be - a BBQ joint
column5: and sausage (and probably pulled pork and chicken but they ran out due to the abundance of Super Bowl orders received)
column7: and it's BYOB so I got to enjoy it all with some Begyle American Pale Ale
column8: and a Hop Whoopin'.   Honestly guys
column9: the brisket was the best I've had in Chicago no contest...perfectly smoked and tender with delicious burnt bits here and there.
